content.raw: I tried the simple differential drive model tutorial and it worked fine.  Then I realized I have been using the diff_drive_controller node from the ros_controllers package instead of the Gazebo libgazebo_ros_diff_drive.so plugin since I was having trouble with the plugin in release 7.0.9.  I just now tried the plugin again from release 7.14 and it appears to work OK.  So I'm going to ditch the diff_drive_controller for now and it seems this is not a Gazebo problem after all.

Then I realized I have been using the diff_drive_controller node from the ros_controllers package instead of the Gazebo libgazebo_ros_diff_drive.so plugin since I was having trouble with the plugin in release 7.0.9. I just now tried the plugin again from release 7.14 and it appears to work OK. So I'm going to ditch the diff_drive_controller for now and it seems this is not a Gazebo problem after all.
